name: Imperial Academy Training (V)
Lore: 'Graduates of the Empire''s military academies train to fire standardissue weapons efficiently.',
Text: 'Deploy on table. Imperials armed with a blaster or rifle at battleground sites are forfeit +2 and their weapon destiny draws are +1. Once per battle, if you have a non-lightsaber weapon there, may use 2 Force to add 4 to your total power. (Immune to Alter.)',
